channel.title: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament

item.title: Opinion Poll by YouGov, 31 May–4 June 2019 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Socialdemokraterne (S&D): 24.7–30.0%
  • Dansk Folkeparti (EAPN): 9.5–13.3%
  • Venstre (ALDE): 16.4–21.0%
  • Enhedslisten–De Rød-Grønne (GUE/NGL): 6.7–10.0%
  • Liberal Alliance (ALDE): 2.3–4.4%
  • Alternativet (Greens/EFA): 1.9–3.9%
  • Radikale Venstre (ALDE): 6.2–9.4%
  • Socialistisk Folkeparti (Greens/EFA): 5.5–8.6%
  • Det Konservative Folkeparti (EPP): 3.5–6.0%
  • Kristendemokraterne (EPP): 1.1–2.6%
  • Nye Borgerlige (*): 3.6–6.2%
  • Klaus Riskær Pedersen (*): 0.0–0.7%
  • Stram Kurs (*): 2.1–4.2%
